title: Is notification email working again for roger?

discussion.body:
amazing, i got mail!

<details><summary>...</summary>

On Mon, 2022-11-07 at 06:46 +0000, Ercan Ucan (@ercan.ucan) wrote:
> Ercan Ucancommented:
> @bufferoverflow email mention test
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitLab.
> You're receiving this email because you have been mentioned on
> gitlab.com. Unsubscribe from this thread · Manage all notifications ·
> Help

</details>

yes, it's broken - `text/html`: `personal_access_tokens.rb` - `text/plain`: `[personal_access_tokens.rb](lib/api/personal_access_tokens.rb)` they send relative links.
mail source extract ``` Sender: gitlab@mg.gitlab.com Date: Tue, 11 Oct 2022 16:13:45 +0000 From: "Peter Marko (@petermarko)" Reply-To: siemens / GitLab To: roger@bufferoverflow.ch Message-ID: In-Reply-To: References: Subject: Re: GitLab | test issue (#3) Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="--==_mimepart_63459639c4dc6_254ca6c9c26325c"; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit X-GitLab-Project: GitLab X-GitLab-Project-Id: 5450909 X-GitLab-Project-Path: siemens/gitlab List-Id: siemens/gitlab <5450909.gitlab.siemens.gitlab.com> List-Unsubscribe: , X-GitLab-Issue-ID: 116681690 X-GitLab-Issue-IID: 3 X-GitLab-NotificationReason: mentioned X-GitLab-Discussion-ID: 7a58ba2cfe10aefb4f5f74951faed398dfe5c1d2 X-GitLab-Reply-Key: 6633a960f5627c10fe4e311504c44b71 Auto-Submitted: auto-generated X-Auto-Response-Suppress: All Authentication-Results: mx.infomaniak.com; spf=pass smtp.mailfrom=mg.gitlab.com X-Infomaniak-Type: ham X-Spam-Score: -10 X-Spam-Detail:  X-Infomaniak-Spam: ham X-Infomaniak-Cause: gAAAAABjRZafUQ-WnYG6HZUL2rF8bemEnPaMLJG9uqwkWj1sqrmkJxzXc3LCawBX_DbVQOgiURYcOcQX8mU5y_-bCcJ6vW4U6O8OVMdA_p1pYFYAVpVx3UEVbdEbywlC36w6-csWczUTqcMIbaR6s5CHFPRVZnF-EaCu5dKh0bTJF9AaHAmsPAn6_PSDlbyhfZy3p4wORAHmZWKZk0lVv2S3Apdfsn-vB3iIRk7WBSuGNedwQCrdTETgjnU0uv6wwAc6OFwm8sVI9JHSLO6XQmBwPNOU-DftQSXye8z3Iw-UmM086GzAojkrqUGUL4HxTn5RLD5A4crNiftIgkRf_EcozVKW8L_xuAXYADnAwgi0TGLFm_Hisvrk_tFAQeBYc6AuVN3skati X-Evolution-Source: 95da02725795adb1def804da9d33dec59e6aee5d ----==_mimepart_63459639c4dc6_254ca6c9c26325c Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Peter Marko commented: @bufferoverflow [personal_access_tokens.rb](lib/api/personal_access_tokens.rb) - test link links to files -- Reply to this email directly or view it on GitLab: https://gitlab.com/siemens/gitlab/-/issues/3#note_1131814183 You're receiving this email because you have been mentioned on gitlab.com. ----==_mimepart_63459639c4dc6_254ca6c9c26325c Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit GitLab

Peter Marko commented:

@bufferoverflow personal_access_tokens.rb - test link links to files

—
